name: IT201 Project 1 (sf46)
description:
Feature 1

When you move the mouse, the mouse x & y position is shown in the top left

Feature 2

Left click on the green platform to create a single cube on top of the platform where you clicked

Feature 3

The “Initial Velocity” slider will make all newly created cubes start off with an initial left/right velocity. Center means 0

Feature 4

The “Wind” slider will change the velocity of all created cubes every frame by this value. Center means 0
